Package com.cypher.hardwarecommunication

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ComponentListener
    Used to actively listen to component changes while connected to a device
    ConnectionListener
    Used to listen to connects / disconnects with a device
    ErrorListener
    Used to actively listen to errors while connected to a device
    ScanListener
    Used to actively listen to a device scan
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BreadMote
    This class is the starting point for BreadMote operations.
    ButtonComponent
    Represents a Button used to interact with the hardware.
    CheckBoxComponent
    Represents a CheckBox used to interact with the hardware.
    Component<Value>
    The root class for all types of components that the hardware can specify.
    Connection
    Represents a connection with a device
    Device
    Represents a connectable device returned during a scan
    Error
    Represents an error generated by the hardware or by the BreadMote SDK.
    LabelComponent
    Represents a Label that displays values sent from the hardware.
    RadioComponent
    Represents a radio group (exclusive set of options) specified from the hardware.
    SliderComponent
    Represents a Slider (aka SeekBar) used to interact with the hardware.
    SwitchComponent
    Represents a Switch used to interact with the hardware.
    TextFieldComponent
    Represents a text field that can be used to send a string to the hardware.
    TimePickerComponent
    Represents a time picker that can be used to send a simple 24 hour time value to the hardware.
    TimePickerComponent.SimpleTimeValue
    Represents a 24 hour time value, e.g.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConnectionType
    Indicates the type of connection
